WAP.content: natural right claims to found its prescription on observation > a performative, a “must,” turns into an “is,” a description: limit btwn essence, possibility, having-to-be, btwn natural/positive law is surreptitiously crossed
[natural law legitimates itself by denying its performativity]
declaration of a right hides performative under constative > “convention” always assumes a philosophy: community never given but constituted by the right
